title: How to Get Easy Cash in Godfather Blackhand Edition

steps.headline: Rob a bank.
steps.description: See article "How to rob a bank in Godfather Blackhand Edition"

steps.headline: Don't regularly go on rampages.
steps.description: This will waste ammo and time.

steps.headline: Only pull out your weapon if you have to kill someone.
Rather than buying ammo, use cheat codes.
If you see a mob courier, shoot him ASAP.
Take over stores, rackets, warehouses, and hubs.
If "Buy Out" is an option, do that.
When using skill points, use a few on the tab "Negotiator" and weakness points for store owners will be revealed, more income and other edges.
When you see a cash register, punch it and get all the cash.
When taking over a warehouse, try to get a hit squad.
steps.description: This will cost a lot of money, but it is very helpful.

steps.headline: After you take over a warehouse, there will be trucks.
steps.description: If you deliver the trucks to certain destinations you will get 10 grand a piece.

steps.headline: Take over racket trucks on the road.
steps.description: Stand in front of them, shoot the truck with your Tommy Gun and shoot everyone but the truck driver. These trucks will only be worth 3 grand-9 grand a piece.

steps.headline: Try not to die.
steps.description: Doctor visits don't come cheap you know!

steps.headline: Try to blackmail city chiefs.
steps.description: For instance, there is a chief in Brooklyn that does drugs. Go make moves on certain girls and they will give you valuable info. Blackmail is free, so it saves you 1,000s of dollars!

steps.headline: Don't try to save your money!
steps.description: If you have over 200,000 it would be a nice time to start buying safehouses!

steps.headline: Don't be a sucker for 2nd Level Gun upgrades!
steps.description: If you just save cash for 3rd Level upgrades you will save hundreds of thousands of dollars!

steps.headline: Don't do anything for cash!
steps.description: If there is some cash on the ground and you are at low health, get a car and run!

steps.headline: Hit Squads should be rarely used, and so should right hand men.

text: Rob a bank. See article "How to rob a bank in Godfather Blackhand Edition" Don't regularly go on rampages. This will waste ammo and time. Only pull out your weapon if you have to kill someone.  Rather than buying ammo, use cheat codes. (search on Google) If you see a mob courier, shoot him ASAP.  Take over stores, rackets, warehouses, and hubs.  If "Buy Out" is an option, do that. This will maximize your income. When using skill points, use a few on the tab "Negotiator" and weakness points for store owners will be revealed, more income and other edges.  When you see a cash register, punch it and get all the cash.  When taking over a warehouse, try to get a hit squad. This will cost a lot of money, but it is very helpful. After you take over a warehouse, there will be trucks. If you deliver the trucks to certain destinations you will get 10 grand a piece. Take over racket trucks on the road. Stand in front of them, shoot the truck with your Tommy Gun and shoot everyone but the truck driver. These trucks will only be worth 3 grand-9 grand a piece. Try not to die. Doctor visits don't come cheap you know! Try to blackmail city chiefs. For instance, there is a chief in Brooklyn that does drugs. Go make moves on certain girls and they will give you valuable info. Blackmail is free, so it saves you 1,000s of dollars! Don't try to save your money! If you have over 200,000 it would be a nice time to start buying safehouses! Don't be a sucker for 2nd Level Gun upgrades! If you just save cash for 3rd Level upgrades you will save hundreds of thousands of dollars! Don't do anything for cash! If there is some cash on the ground and you are at low health, get a car and run! Hit Squads should be rarely used, and so should right hand men.
